meta.title: Frozt Coolers - Premium Coolers & Thermoses
meta.description: Experience premium coolers and thermoses with superior ice retention and durability. Stay cool anywhere with Frozt Coolers.

hero.title: Stay Cool Anywhere
hero.subtitle: Premium coolers and thermoses designed for adventure

coolers.title: Premium Coolers
coolers.description: Built to keep ice for days, our coolers are designed for the toughest adventures.

thermoses.title: Insulated Thermoses
thermoses.description: Keep your drinks hot or cold for hours with our premium insulated thermoses.

list.title: Long Ice Retention
list.description: Keep ice for up to 7 days with our superior insulation technology.

list.title: Durable Design
list.description: Built to withstand tough conditions and years of use.

list.title: BPA-Free
list.description: All products are made with BPA-free materials for your safety.

list.title: Premium Finish
list.description: Elegant, scratch-resistant exterior built for real-world use.

list.name: Michael T.
list.text: My Frozt cooler kept ice solid for our entire 5-day camping trip. Impressive performance!

list.name: Sarah J.
list.text: The thermos is amazing - my coffee stays hot all day during hiking trips.

list.name: David R.
list.text: Best cooler I've ever owned. Worth every penny for the quality and performance.
